review: If zero stars were an option, that's exactly what this product would've/should've received. After 3 Fire sticks, we're sticking/stuck with cable as the sticks just don't want to work for more than 1 week, 2 days and 2 hours respectively. Maybe version 2.0 will actually allow me to "cut the cord", but the Fire stick simply isn't ready to be sold to anyone not willing to be Beta testers and that's not me.
author: Lynn Prenat

review: It works great !  Lots of things to watch for free . I recommend this to any one who travels or spends time away from home.

review: Not enough new stuff, mostly more than 3 years old, also tends to "buffer" several times during each show, sometimes stopping all together , many "errors" saying cannot access at this time, and very tiring much of the time. Whereas on the same internet access, the appletv adapter has none of htese issues.. We tried them both on several systems, and sorry firestick, you are not even a close second.
